animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in the water. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦢 I have feathers and a beak.
👪 I often travel in a line with my family.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: ⚫ I am often black and white.

animal.question: I meow and purr and love to chase string. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail and love to play fetch. What am I?
I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am the biggest land animal.
💧 I can use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love to eat bananas. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am very good at climbing.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?
I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am a very strong animal.

animal.question: I hop around and carry my baby in a pouch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I like to eat grass and leaves.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 No two of us have the same stripes.
🐎 I look a bit like a horse.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Rabbits like to nibble on me.

plant.question: I have a long stem, colorful petals, and smell sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am big and tall with a trunk and branches. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I provide shade on a sunny day.
🍁 I lose my leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and green, and you can find yummy peas inside me! What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am a type of vegetable.
🧑‍🍳 You can cook me in a soup.

plant.question: I grow on a vine, I am red or green, and I am sweet and juicy. What am I?
I have prickles and smell nice, and can be red, pink or white. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often given as a symbol of love.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a fluffy snack when heated. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You eat me at the movies.
🔥 I go 'pop' when I get hot!

plant.question: I'm a big, round fruit that's green on the outside and red inside, with black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very juicy and refreshing in summer.
🚜 I grow on vines close to the ground.
🔪 You need a big knife to cut me.

plant.question: I am a tall, strong grass, and my seeds make flour for bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I wave in the wind in large fields.
🟡 I am golden when I'm ready to harvest.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows underground, has brown skin, and makes yummy fries. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 You can make fries from me.
☘️ Some people think my plant brings good luck.
